verbs.description: [ARG1: asian markets] [V: mixed] [ARGM-CAU: on caution over costs from tariff hikes] world markets are mixed as traders mull the impact of tariffs on corporate america after big industrial companies admitted they were facing rising costs trump new york mercantile exchange japan jingyi pan america russell writer caterpillar inc new york brent crude south korea joe hayes hurler australia singapore u s ihs markit alex veiga china 3 m co purchasing manager analyst caterpillar manhattan hong kong joe hayes
